item.title: 美国经济正在出现裂痕。美联储会怎么做？
item.description: 经济最脆弱国家的金融困境迹象越来越多，足以让人相信美联储已准备好在数据允许的情况下尽快降息。杰罗姆-鲍威尔的评论将有助于提供有关时机的线索。【原文：Signs of financial distress among the most economically vulnerable are mounting enough to believe the Fed is ready to cut rates as soon as the data allow. Jerome Powell’s commentary will help provide clues on the timing.】

item.title: 英国女子比特币洗钱罪名成立，与 60 亿美元中国诈骗案有关
item.description: 一名妇女被伦敦陪审团认定犯有为一名中国逃犯清洗大量比特币的罪行，该逃犯被认为策划了一起近 60 亿美元的投资诈骗案。【原文：A woman was found guilty by a London jury of laundering massive amounts of Bitcoin for a Chinese fugitive who is thought to have orchestrated a near $6 billion investment fraud.】

item.title: 欧元区消费者信心指数升至两年新高
卖空者拉塞尔-克拉克考虑重启对冲基金
item.description: 两年前，做空者罗素-克拉克（Russell Clark）在历史上持续时间最长的牛市中失利后关闭了自己的对冲基金，现在他正准备卷土重来。【原文：Short seller Russell Clark, who shuttered his hedge fund two years ago after losing out to the longest running bull market in history, is preparing a comeback.】

item.title: 审计师德勤辞职，巴克莱家族的 Very 集团遭受重创
item.description: 德勤（Deloitte）辞去了零售企业 Very 集团的审计师职务，在巴克莱家族的商业帝国及其之前对《每日电讯报》的所有权日益受到关注的背景下，Very 集团的债务价值受到冲击。【原文：Deloitte has quit as auditor of retail business the Very Group, hitting the value of its debt amid a growing spotlight on the Barclay family’s business empire and its previous ownership of the Telegraph newspaper.】

item.title: Topgolf Callaway 因报告称正探讨出售或分拆上市而大涨
item.description: Topgolf Callaway Brands Corp. 自 2022 年 5 月以来的最大涨幅，因为有报道称该公司正在探索出售其设备制造部门。【原文：Topgolf Callaway Brands Corp. jumped the most since May 2022 following a report that the company is exploring a sale of its equipment-making arm.】

item.title: 由于市场对俄罗斯交易存有疑虑，德国莱弗森银行推迟出售 AT1 项目
item.description: 德国莱弗森国际银行股份公司（Raiffeisen Bank International AG）推迟了出售混合证券的计划，此前有报道对其从俄罗斯业务部门汇回利润的计划表示怀疑，并导致该银行股价暴跌。【原文：Raiffeisen Bank International AG postponed the planned sale of hybrid securities after a report cast doubt about its plan to repatriate profits from its Russian unit and sent shares of the lender tumbling.】

item.title: 银行老板用浴室取代分行遭议员批评
item.description: 据立法者称，英国客户对位于不寻常地点的替代银行分行感到 "困惑"，这些地点包括花园中心，甚至以前的公共厕所。【原文：British customers are “perplexed” by substitute bank branches in unusual locations including a garden center and even a former public toilet, according to lawmakers.】

item.description:
宏利人寿的唐纳德向鲍威尔发出请求："给我一些启示"

Manulife’s Donald offers a plea aimed at Powell: ‘Give me some insight’

item.title: 印度莫迪在和平峰会前与普京和泽连斯基通话
item.description: 据印度总理办公室称，印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪周三与乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基和弗拉基米尔-普京通了电话。【原文：India’s Prime Minister Narendra Modi spoke to Ukraine’s President Volodymyr Zelenskiy and Vladimir Putin over the phone on Wednesday, weeks ahead of a global peace summit in Switzerland to resolve war in Ukraine, according to the Prime Minister’s Office.】

item.title: 肯尼亚贷款机构运营成本激增，KCB 利润下降 8
item.description: 肯尼亚最大的银行肯尼亚商业银行集团（KCB Group Plc）称，由于运营成本激增 61%，全年利润下降 8%。【原文：KCB Group Plc said full-year profit fell 8% as Kenya’s biggest bank saw operating costs surged 61%.】

item.title: 欧洲央行施纳贝尔认为自然利率上升是转折点
item.description: 3 月 20 日，伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔在法兰克福 摄影师：Alex Kraus/Bloomberg【原文：Isabel Schnabel in Frankfurt, on March 20. Photographer: Alex Kraus/Bloomberg】

item.title: Reddit 股东指导 IPO 价格在区间顶部或以上
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Reddit 公司及其卖方股东正在引导他们将这家社交媒体公司的首次公开募股定价定在市场范围的顶端或更高。【原文：Reddit Inc. and its selling shareholders are guiding that they could price the social media company’s initial public offering at the top of its marketed range or above, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 以隐晦的环境、社会和公司治理（ESG）声明来增加奖金的做法受到激进分子的质疑
item.description: 随着公司越来越多地将高管薪酬与环境、社会和公司治理挂钩，有证据表明，附加条款被用来提高薪酬待遇，而没有带来任何有意义的环境、社会和公司治理方面的改善。【原文：As companies increasingly tie executive pay to ESG, there’s evidence to suggest the add-on is being used to enable bigger remuneration packages without leading to any meaningful environmental, social or governance improvement.】

item.title: Access 银行将收购肯尼亚 NBK 银行，加强在主要市场的影响力
item.description: Access Bank Plc 计划收购 KCB Group Plc 旗下的肯尼亚国家银行，从而加强尼日利亚最大银行在东非重要市场的地位。【原文：Access Bank Plc plans to acquire National Bank of Kenya from KCB Group Plc, boosting the foothold of Nigeria’s biggest bank in a key East African market.】

item.title: 计划外加息后，埃及取消下一次货币政策委员会会议
item.description: 2023年1月7日，星期六，埃及开罗，埃及中央银行大楼。随着几轮货币贬值波及消费者，埃及城市通胀以五年来最快的速度加速。摄影师: Islam Safwat/Bloomberg【原文：The Central Bank of Egypt building in Cairo, Egypt, on Saturday, Jan. 7, 2023. Egypt’s urban inflation accelerated at its fastest pace in five years as several rounds of currency devaluation filtered through to consumers. Photographer: Islam Safwat/Bloomberg】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司债券持有者在 120 亿美元股权损失后毫发无损
item.description: 巴西石油公司（Petroleo Brasileiro SA）在总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）的政治压力下决定不发放特别股息，这引发了股票抛售，使这家国有石油生产商的市值缩水数十亿美元。不过，债券持有者的日子还不错。【原文：Petroleo Brasileiro SA’s decision to skip a special dividend amid political pressure from President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva triggered an equity selloff that wiped billions from the state-owned oil producer’s market capitalization. Bondholders, however, are doing just fine.】

item.title: 道富加强平台建设，扩大人员轮岗，为结算规则变更做准备
item.description: 美国道富银行（State Street Corp. ）花了一年多的时间准备其技术，以加快结算时间，加入了众多金融机构的行列，进行调整以避免因 5 月底生效的新法规而可能出现的交易失败。【原文：State Street Corp. has spent more than a year preparing its technology for faster settlement times, joining a slew of financial institutions making adjustments to avoid failed trades that could occur as a result of new regulations that come into effect late May.】

item.title: CERAWeek 全球能源会议的最新消息
item.description: 德克萨斯州休斯顿的 2024 年 S&P Global CERAWeek 会议。摄影师：卡特-史密斯/布隆伯格【原文：The 2024 CERAWeek by S&P Global conference in Houston, Texas. Photographer: F. Carter Smith/Bloomberg】

item.title: 武装分子在中国运营的巴基斯坦港口附近发动袭击
item.description: 据当地警方官员称，不明身份的武装分子在巴基斯坦西南部俾路支地区的瓜达尔港附近发动了袭击。【原文：Unidentified militants have staged an attack near Pakistan’s Gwadar port complex in the country’s southwest Balochistan region, according to a local police official.】

item.title: 战区石油管道破裂，苏丹宣布不可抗力
item.description: 苏丹宣布对石油出口实施不可抗力，称由于位于战区的输油管道发生 "重大破裂"，苏丹不再从邻国南苏丹获得石油供应。【原文：Sudan declared a force majeure on oil exports, saying it’s no longer receiving supplies from neighboring South Sudan following a “major rupture” in a pipeline that’s in a war zone.】

item.title: 人工智能成为能源世界的下一个新亮点
item.description:

item.title: 高盛谋划成为前五大模式投资组合参与者的路线
item.description: 高盛资产管理公司（Goldman Sachs Asset Management）正在规划一条通往顶级企业的道路，预计到本十年末，该公司将发展成为一个价值超过 10 万亿美元的行业。【原文：Goldman Sachs Asset Management is charting a path to break into the top ranks of what’s projected to grow into a more than $10 trillion industry by the end of the decade.】

item.title: 成本增加，安哥拉政府工人为提高薪酬举行罢工
item.description: 安哥拉政府工人开始了为期三天的罢工，要求提高工资和降低税收，以弥补非洲第二大石油生产国不断上涨的生活成本。【原文：Angolan government workers began a three-day strike to press for higher wages and lower taxes to make up for rising living costs in Africa’s second-biggest oil producer.】

item.title: 人工智能乐观情绪推动 IBM 股价上涨 19%，创 2013 年以来首个纪录
item.description: 科技界历史最悠久的公司之一悄无声息地击败了华尔街一些最热门的股票。【原文：One of the oldest companies in tech has been quietly trouncing some of the hottest stocks on Wall Street.】

item.title: 债券投资者热衷于类似 AT1 的特殊类型债务
item.description: 一个与银行额外一级债券相似的神秘保险债券市场正在升温，投资者正急于购买这种债券，而监管截止日期使得今年的供应量可能激增。【原文：An esoteric insurance bond market with similarities to banks’ Additional Tier 1s is heating up, with investors rushing to buy the debt just as a regulatory deadline makes a surge in supply likely this year.】

item.title: 在对贷款人的审查增加后，Finma 计划对瑞银进行压力测试
item.description: 瑞士金融监管机构Finma表示，今年将对瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）进行两次压力测试，因为该机构在收购瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）后加强了对该银行的监管。【原文：Switzerland’s financial regulator Finma said it would carry out two stress tests at UBS Group AG this year, as the authority boosts oversight of the lender in the wake of its acquisition of Credit Suisse.】

item.title: 智利逆转外汇波动性崩溃，交易员陷入猜测
item.description: 全球货币波动剧烈。在智利，交易员们说，政策制定者正在维持汇率波动。【原文：Currency swings are tumbling across the globe. In Chile, traders say policymakers are keeping it volatile.】
